What is the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and how does it work?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform where users can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs (non-fungible tokens) directly on the blockchain. This allows for peer-to-peer transactions without the need for intermediaries. Users can advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale publicly on the blockchain for anyone to see. Transactions are executed in a completely decentralized and transparent way, with the option to use zero-knowledge private addresses for added privacy.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.

What benefits does the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace offer to users?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace offers several benefits to users, including:

* Decentralized and peer-to-peer transactions, eliminating the need for intermediaries
* Transparency and auditability of transactions
* Option to use zero-knowledge private addresses for added privacy
* Ability to execute transactions directly on the blockchain
* Ability to select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in the digital ownership economy

What is Verus Vault, and how does it enhance the security of VerusIDs?

Verus Vault is a security feature that allows users to lock their VerusIDs, protecting their funds from theft even if their private key is compromised. When a VerusID is locked with Vault, the user cannot spend funds from that identity until it is unlocked. However, they can still stake those funds on the Verus network and earn rewards. Additionally, they can still receive funds while the identity is locked.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace

What are the requirements to enable Verus Vault capabilities, such as revocation, recovery, and locking of VerusIDs?
To enable Verus Vault capabilities, including revocation, recovery, and locking of VerusIDs, users must have at least one primary identity and at least one revocation/recovery ID configured.
